title: Fix remove-root-task test - FIRST_TASKS not being recalculated when root is removed
Simplify remove-task to only remove from current project (not trash)
Implement insert-before with multiple predecessors
description: When selected task has multiple predecessors, prompt user to choose which parent to insert after. Only rewire that parent→selected edge to parent→new→selected. Leave other parents unchanged.

title: Update add-child and insert-before to prioritize current project tasks
Create helper function to exclude current project tasks from selection
Update add-root to exclude current project tasks from selection
Write test for remove-from-project with multiple parents
Implement insert-after with one successor
description: Replace current add-child delegation. When selected has one successor: A→B becomes A→C→B. Remove A→B, add A→C and C→B dependencies.

title: Fix trash-task to handle orphaned successors correctly
Create helper function to prioritize current project tasks in selection
notes:
Tests consistently fail with wrong ordering. All other graph transient tests PASS, suggesting test infrastructure works.

Current implementation:
- org-gtd-graph--get-all-gtd-tasks: Uses with-org-gtd-context + 'agenda scope
- org-gtd-graph--select-or-create-task-prioritizing-current: Uses org-gtd-get-task-projects
- Filters out project headings (ORG_GTD='Projects')
- Partitions by project membership using (member project-id project-ids)

Test Results:
- Test 1: Expects task-in-project first, gets different ID (wrong ordering)  
- Test 2: PASSES (finds external task correctly)
- Test 3: Gets nil (empty result list)

Logic appears sound but results don't match. Needs investigation into:
1. Why test 1 returns wrong ID first (partitioning issue?)
2. Why test 3 returns empty (org-map-entries not finding tasks?)
3. Possible difference in how test vs production buffers/files are handled

title: Fix add-blocker to insert between task and parent
Implement insert-after with multiple successors
description: When selected has multiple successors, prompt user to choose which child to insert before. Only rewire that selected→child edge to selected→new→child. Leave other children unchanged. Symmetrical with insert-before behavior.

title: Fix test interaction issue with refile test
